Hollywood Vibes
/$
$
B Leaf Karaoke is your go-to spot for a fun and unique karaoke experience. Our laid-back atmosphere, delicious drinks, and amazing snacks make it the perfect destination for a night out with friends or to meet amazing people.

BLEAFers Say
/$
$
Steve Goldberg - ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
‚Äã
"B Leaf is a little gem of a place! In addition to being a smoke shop, it offers the BEST karaoke nightlife Hollywood has to offer. It‚Äôs super casual and always a lot of fun. Amil is wonderful and will make you feel right at home. This is literally my favorite place in Hollywood. Highly recommend for a fun night out!"

The Full Story
/$
$
About
/$
$
"Since B Leaf opened in 2021, every visit has brought our guests an unforgettable experience.
Nestled in the heart of Young Circle, Hollywood, FL, B Leaf isn't just your ordinary smoke shop‚Äîit's a sanctuary for those seeking good vibes and great company. Our patrons rave about our lively karaoke nights hosted by my crew and me, where the atmosphere is as relaxed as a gathering among friends in your living room. Whether you're belting out your favorite tunes or engaging in friendly banter over video games, B Leaf radiates a chill energy that's hard to find elsewhere.
‚Äã
But it's not just about the entertainment; it's about the sense of belonging that permeates every corner of our space. As one reviewer aptly put it, stepping into B Leaf feels like discovering the secret hideout you've always dreamed of‚Äîa place where judgment is left at the door and camaraderie reigns supreme. My team and I are more than just hosts; we're the architects of an environment where everyone is welcome, connections are forged, and memories are made.
And, of course, we're not just about the experience‚Äîwe take pride in offering top-notch service and products. From our selection of smoking supplies to our friendly, no-pressure assistance, we're here to ensure your needs are met and exceeded.
So whether you're dropping by to stock up on essentials or immerse yourself in our karaoke nights' vibrant energy, B Leaf Smoke Shop is your go-to destination for a truly unforgettable time in Hollywood. Join us- because if you BLEAF, we BLEAF!"
-Amil, Host & Founder
